mapper.select: select nno, mymemail, nememail, ndate, nemurl, m.mmyimage, m.mnickname from neighbor n, member m where m.memail=n.nememail and memail=#{memail} order by ndate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO neighbor(nno, mymemail, nememail, nemurl, ndate) VALUES (SEQ_NEIGHBOR_NNO.nextval, #{mymemail}, #{nememail}, #{nemurl}, sysdate)
